entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:19 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 4.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 8:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:36 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:36 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
